// adapted from http://www.sheshbabu.com/posts/automatic-pageview-tracking-using-react-router/
import{useEffect}from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var GoogleAnalytics=function GoogleAnalytics(){var history=useHistory();function trackPageView(){if(typeof window.ga==='function'){window.ga("set","page",window.location.pathname);window.ga("send","pageview");}}useEffect(function(){trackPageView();history.listen(trackPageView);},[history]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"GA_temp"});};export default GoogleAnalytics;
